messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Wonderful rainy day
messages.msgSnippet: Thanx for sharing such a great day! I often forget to go out when weather is not perfect and just enjoy! ===== KELLY mama to: RAINY PHOENIX & TIA

go out when weather is not perfect and just enjoy!

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Wonderful rainy day
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sounds like so much fun, Pam.  We ve been having great spring-like weather here lately.  Really, truly, amazingly nice.  Last year at this time, it was
messages.messageBody:
> We had such a wonderful day today. So tired of all the bad weather and rain
> all day today. We decided to go for a walk in the rain on our property so we
> dressed up and headed out the door. Splashed in many puddles, walked through
> the forest looking at the trees that had fallen with the last storm. Walked
> by the creeks looking at the deer tracks. Picked up mines (golf balls hit
> out there by dad). Stopped and hit the mines back down in the field. Looked
> at everything and decided that we should go walking in the rain more often.

Sounds like so much fun, Pam. We've been having great spring-like weather
here lately. Really, truly, amazingly nice. Last year at this time, it was
raining every day and we were inches deep in mud. So I'm doubly grateful
every time the sun comes out in the morning.

Unfortunately, my son has been fighting a stomache bug, so going outside to
play was out. But we had a great day, too. Tim still had some fever, but
was feeling so much better today.

We sorted all of Tim's coins into the boxes that you sent (thanks!),
labelled the sections, and made a list of all the countries he has
represented (88, in the final count!!!). And we spent hours sitting in the
sunny living room paging through coin books trying to identify three elusive
coins without obvious country names on them (Morocco, Tunisia, and Croatia).

We took breaks to watch all the videos he's almost outgrown and hasn't seen
in ages. I haven't had this much fun with a sick child, ever!

brenda

messages.subject: Wonderful rainy day
messages.msgSnippet: We had such a wonderful day today.  So tired of all the bad weather and rain all day today.  We decided to go for a walk in the rain on our property so we
messages.messageBody:
We had such a wonderful day today. So tired of all the bad weather and rain
all day today. We decided to go for a walk in the rain on our property so we
dressed up and headed out the door. Splashed in many puddles, walked through
the forest looking at the trees that had fallen with the last storm. Walked
by the creeks looking at the deer tracks. Picked up mines (golf balls hit
out there by dad). Stopped and hit the mines back down in the field. Looked
at everything and decided that we should go walking in the rain more often.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
